_inspectorSnowReport.Report: First day skiing at Deer Valley? Get acquainted with the mountain by joining our Mountain Hosts for a complimentary tour. Tours are available for expert skiers at 9:30 a.m. and 1:30 p.m. and for intermediate skiers at 10 a.m. and 1:30 p.m.
_inspectorSnowReport.AdditionalText: Come enjoy blue skies and our famous corduroy! The groomers choice run today is Lost Boulder on Flagstaff Mountain.
